Class SmileMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • Message
      • SmileMessage

  • public class SmileMessage
extends Message
    A class that extends Message and creates a message with an ASCII smile as its text.
    Author:
    Chris Schmidt

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class Message

        Message.Status

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String smile 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SmileMessage(java.lang.String from, java.lang.String to)
      Creates a SmileMessage object setting the from/to properties of the message based on parameters and the status to unread.

    • Field Detail

      • smile

        public static final java.lang.String smile
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • SmileMessage

        public SmileMessage(java.lang.String from,
                    java.lang.String to)
        Creates a SmileMessage object setting the from/to properties of the message based on parameters and the status to unread. The text of the message is a smile drawn with ASCII.
        Parameters:
        from - The user sending the message. Must not be null.
        to - The user receiving the message. Must not be null.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - for null parameters
